ticket.title: xtask Stage X0: explicit NON-AUTHORITATIVE banner (keep usable)

in_scope: Print NON-AUTHORITATIVE banner for xtask review/aat/push/security tasks.
Document xtask outputs as non-authoritative scaffolding.

steps: Add banner to xtask status-writing tasks.
Update RFC-0018 docs to mark xtask as non-authoritative.

criteria: xtask status-writing tasks print NON-AUTHORITATIVE banner.
Docs explicitly label xtask outputs as non-authoritative.

notes.security:
xtask remains usable but must be explicitly non-authoritative to avoid
truth-plane confusion.
notes.general: Stage X0 is required before any further xtask authority reduction.
